Total Credits: Students complete the pre-physician assistant curriculum and the requirements of a UMBC major in a minimum of 120 credits.
Biology (23 credits): BIOL 141 - Foundations of Biology: Cells, Energy and Organisms (4)
BIOL 142 - Foundations of Biology: Ecology and Evolution (4)
BIOL 251 - Human Anatomy and Physiology I (3)
BIOL 251L - Human Anatomy and Physiology I Laboratory (1)
BIOL 252 - Human Anatomy and Physiology II (3)
BIOL 252L - Human Anatomy and Physiology II Laboratory. (1)

Select one of the following courses:: STAT 121 - Introduction to Statistics for the Social Sciences (4)
STAT 350 - Statistics with Applications in the Biological Sciences (4)

Experience with Patients: Students should expect to have 1,000-10,000 hours of direct experience with patients when they apply to PA programs.
